mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, CONTAINERNUMBER, FTCBM, ARRIVALPERIOD, LCLTIME, OUTPORTTIME, TOWAREHOUSETIME, INWAREHOUSETIME, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, CONTAINERINFO, PACKAGEINGLIST, EXPRESSID, CHECKTIME, TOPURPOSEPORTTIME, RECEIPT, EXPRESSTYPE, TRANSPORTFARE, POSITION, CONTENT, OPERTYPE from DB_LCLLOG where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
